name: Cooking Games Burger - Kitchen Chef & Food Maker
name_original: Cooking Games Burger - Kitchen Chef & Food Maker
description:
Cooking Game Fever - Dash Chef is a new free cooking games for girls and kids which love to cook french cuisine or american cuisine!You will learn in the game how to cook delicious dishes and manage your own restaurant and become a true Star Super Chef in kitchen!Become as famous as Ramsay or Chef Oliver & Nigella and start creating a delicious diner dash!Beat your fever cooking today and start to cook in each country in the world,delicious meals,dish and desserts!You can start with tasty fast food to Oriental Restaurant and Chinese Restaurants foods and learn all the cooking techniques in the world of chef!Use only the best ingredients to create tasty dishes!Your kitchen will become your playground, use all the kitchen appliances like pizza ovens to popcorn maker to cake maker and coffee makers and to rice cookers!The dash of cooking will make out of you the best world chef!
How To Play:
- Join us and Makes your favorite Ice Cream Maker in your mobile device!
- Help Masha and her friends to cook the perfect dinner dash and dish!
- Women adore to stay in the kitchen and prepare the perfect dinner dash for the loved ones!
- Chef Gordon is the boss and you have to do what he says, otherwise your meals and cookies will be burnt!
- Become the world number one chef and build your own trademark in food!
- Steal some really good recipes for preparing hot dogs or tacos and french fries with ketchup toppings!
- Of course,don't forget about pizza games and you'll love the pizza maker games too!
- Multiple challenges, puzzles of different levels and hamburgers to serve the customers with!
- Addicting restaurant time management game and hamburger management!
- Serve fresh hot dog with mustard and Ketchup to make more money!
- The fever cooking is strong, so try to collaborate with your apprentices like a real cooking chef!

Features:
- A million combination of dishes to cook by selecting over 200 ingredients!
- 4 worldwide unique restaurants!
- Over 100 levels to complete and many burgers to create!
- Simulates real time manager games!
- Upgrade your kitchen appliances and interior!
- Decorate your restaurants to bring more clients to buy fresh food!
- Create your own kind of cookies or cupcakes!
- Beat your fever of cooking today!
- Start the dash of cooking and create tasty recipes!
- Play with tasty ice cream maker graphics and functionality!
- Help Masha in her cooking dash adventure and help her discover her chef abilities!
- Start your restaurant business today and you will become a chef world!
- You will enjoy this Fast Food Maker game very much and learn how they cook on the streets of New York or Sydney and master the art of street food maker!
- World chef will teach you how to prepare hot dog or tacos and fries with ketchup topping!
- Open your famous cake shop and serve your customers with some tasty pastry!
- Multiple clients will want to eat hot dogs or burgers, so try to make them fast and serve diner dash in record time!

Download Today the best food maker game on the store - Cooking Game Fever - Dash Chef and leave a nice rating if you like it!
